title: Brothers
plot: Two criminal twin brothers, one trying to reform, embark on a dangerous heist road trip. Facing legal troubles, gunfights, and family drama, they must reconcile their differences before their mission leads to self-destruction.

3319375 3321375 Do you remember what you said?
3348875 3351750 We were going down a dead end.

3570291 3572291 I'm done making deals with you.

3600791 3602541 Hope you didn't have plans, chief!

3628625 3629958 To get people to do shit.

3633916 3636208 You always believe her

3636291 3637500 and that's who she sped off with.

3641541 3644916 Tossed aside by

3651041 3653000 Don't make me come back there!
3708291 3710250 Come on. Let me get it.
3710333 3711916 -Wait, I got it. I got it. I got it.

3734791 3737041 Oh, my God.

3740541 3742958 Ten and two, dickhead.

3749916 3752625 I'm sorry. Is your brother okay?
3758000 3760208 No, I-I... I shouldn't have left.

3762083 3764750 But you did.

3764833 3766666 I'll-I'll be back as soon as I can.
3769000 3771250 Are we doing this together or not?

3773666 3777333 Because I'm not once telling our daughter

3792333 3794458 Come on, get in the car. Let's go.

3794541 3797958 You think all these toasters are busted?

3808708 3811583 And you just keep saying it

3823375 3826375 You know, I really thought

3835708 3841708 This is like when Wile E. Coyote, he draws

3841791 3843791 You know he's gonna run into it.

3853000 3855958 You know, even though

3856041 3859000 I thought Mom always

3863500 3865791 Yeah, she taught me how to run.
3871625 3873791 Oh, right. It's about that time.

3873875 3877208 Moke, go home to your family.

3879875 3883541 You won't as long as that judge

3883625 3885041 We got to get it back.
3888875 3890250 You don't have to do that.
3890333 3892666 Yeah, I don't have to do shit.

3904875 3907875 Second down and six

3918041 3919375 Don't spend all that in one place.
3928166 3930333 How about you count us out, Mom?
3934208 3936958 It was a no-win situation back there.

3937041 3940958 The only shot we had
was to get the loot out.

3941041 3943750 I mean, either one of you
would've done exactly the same thing

3945791 3949166 -Just count out our cut.

to involve us, though, huh?
3973000 3974416 I-I can't. I hit the button.
3974500 3976458 I can't. I already hit the button.
3989708 3991791 How many times you gonna run?!

3997041 3999666 Look. Look, I really
shouldn't let you drive, okay?

4022541 4025166 - Hey, Moke. Down here.

4050958 4053583 -You chose this over me twice.

4053666 4055791 -Oh, no, you didn't.

4055875 4057375 Yeah, you did, but you didn't!

4063375 4065916 -He's gonna take off with it.

4085333 4087083 I got shots fired
at the old Ferndale Mall.

4114458 4117250 -What are you doing?

4117333 4119125 Tell me right now. Were you gonna run?

4131458 4134291 Look, I still got dinner

4134375 4138125 and I don't know what's gonna be open,

4146166 4148625 We're gonna feed hungry boy. Come on.
4152333 4154416 Well, this just got fucked up.

4154500 4157416 Secure the perimeter.

4157500 4161250 -All units, stand by.

4170125 4172125 And yours, too, for my trouble.
4176583 4179458 -Oh, it's a big-ass bag of money.
4190375 4192875 No. Not till we sort this out.
4192958 4194375 What is there to sort out?

4194458 4197416 You think you're gonna talk me
into letting you go?

4197500 4200916 No, but you're gonna let

4203625 4206166 You're married.

-Hey.

4221041 4222500 -Hey!

That I'm gonna walk out the door

4222583 4225458 to a wall full of cops

4225541 4226916 Yeah, that's exactly what I think.

4227000 4229208 Don't be an idiot.

4229291 4232208 Yeah, you heard him, Sasquatch. Bounce!
4233833 4235250 You guys are in this together.
4237166 4238833 No, no, no, since the beginning,

4238916 4240458 -it's been you two.
- That man has been
4244166 4245666 That's been the plan all along.

4245750 4248375 Use me as a diversion

4254375 4256791 -Totally did.

4256875 4259166 You have never trusted me, ever.
4259250 4261791 'Cause all you do is use people.

4261875 4264583 There's not an angle out there that

4266750 4268250 Family?
What do you know about family?

4268333 4270250 You're the one who abandoned me

4270333 4272166 I knew you wouldn't let go of that shit!
4272250 4274583 Yeah, you don't fuck with family.

4274666 4276416 Farful, you're one to talk.

4276500 4278750 My dad thinks that I'm great.
4278833 4281250 Your dad doesn't give a shit about you.

4283250 4286000 -that I am a legend in the making!

4286083 4287500 Wh-What the fuck does that even mean?

4287583 4291583 -It means that--

4291666 4295000 And you guys should fucking
hang out together all the time!

4296166 4297333 - Fuck you, Jady.

4297416 4298416 -No, fuck you! And fuck you!

4300791 4302375 -I'm gonna take it. That's mine.

4303833 4305000 -Give it to me! Let go!

4306708 4308666 -You fucking let go!
-Let go! Give me that fucking thing!
4308750 4309750 Shut up, shut up, shut up!

4365583 4367125 Well, that got

4369500 4371750 -It did a lot better

-Yeah.
4384166 4386666 I think I smell pickles, Daddy.
4386750 4390000 Oh, thank you, nice man. Ow.

4392041 4394500 This is

4394583 4397458 Put the gun down

4398750 4401250 I repeat: we have the place surrounded.
4426125 4427833 Keep an eye on it, then.
4431375 4432375 What are you-- Mom, what are you doing?

4432458 4435541 I worked too hard for that cash
to lose it now.
4435625 4438375 There's an exit to the garage back there.

4438458 4440375 Take the ramp out to the road
and get your ass

4442916 4446541 I mean, this game's a waste of time
if you leave it with nothing.
4450166 4452333 Before I get a better idea.
4457041 4459583 Oh, and by the way, I'm not dying.

4462041 4463333 -Come out with your hands up!

4474875 4478333 -That bag better hold heads of lettuce
4478416 4480791 or the head of a dead-ass hunchie.
4489000 4491291 And he's taking a long lunch.
4497333 4499833 You're one of them, aren't you?

4504958 4507541 I just want the heater

4507625 4511291 Oh, and you think
I'm just gonna give it to you?
4515291 4517458 This is a hair over one-nine.

4517541 4520958 My cut, less expenses

4532958 4535833 I got to tell you something, son.
4545500 4547416 Don't you want to know where your son is?

4549083 4552333 That boy is as worthless
as a chocolate teapot.
4555333 4558041 How old are you, old man?
4560458 4563416 Mm, not enough to spend it all, I bet.
4566625 4569875 You're gonna lose that game, Judge.
4612958 4614625 And I'm not gonna wait again.
4645166 4647166 And you said there was an ape?
4664791 4667625 Is there anything else to talk about?

4721500 4722833 ...I went to go see a lawyer.

4729333 4733333 I don't know. Maybe we drew up the

4744041 4746000 The fuck would you give your half away?

4746083 4748250 The fuck?
You gave your half away, so, you know--

4748333 4750166 No, no, because I knew

4750250 4754166 and I could hit you up if I needed it,

4755750 4758458 Well, now you're gonna have to

4758541 4761083 as soon as she learns how to speak

4769958 4772666 Well, that's her name

4785416 4788083 What you, uh, settle on there?

4795916 4798666 No. Yeah,

4827500 4829625 Okay, Mom, here, let me take her.

4870583 4872625 Maybe not in a traditional sense.

4880208 4883625 Our family, we've always been different.

5107375 5110333 with them, uh, fancy printed skirts.

lines:
32041 35458 You ever think about
trying to unfuck your life?
38333 40333 This is how I did it.
71750 73958 Where the fuck are my matches?

76791 79833 Some families have
a long line of dentists or lawyers.
79916 81875 We had a long line of felons.

83666 85851 - Try it your way.
- -Your dumb-ass twin gonna do his trick?
87750 89375 I'll kick a board up your ass!

93916 96934 The genius drowned a few years later after
getting his dick stuck in a pool drain.
104291 106666 The big ugly one is my twin brother Moke.

107791 109375 - Got it?
- Please don't do that, man.
117500 120041 I had the plans, he had the hands.

122958 126500 Do what you love
and you'll never work a day in your life?
135833 137351 They're working on a little baby safe,

some big-time juggers.

167333 169250 Coming in hot like Earnhardt, baby!

176416 177958 Hot dang, we did it, baby!

179416 182666 I'm gonna fuck you like
we're millionaires, 'cause we are, baby.

182750 186125 - Whoo! Hey, big guy.

186208 187958 That's Mom and her boyfriend Glenn.
189708 192125 Oh, God. Oh, I'm bleeding out.

193791 195416 Oh, I found it! Oh, good, I found it.

195500 197100 Hey, hey, come on.
Don't be scared, Moke.
200250 201375 Muck! Get out of the way!

201458 203166 - Fuckin' A.

- Can I get a plate, Gamma?

205500 207458 - Greens?
- No, ma'am, just the bird.
213833 216083 I know you don't like it. I don't like it.
216166 219458 In fact, I think it fucking sucks.

220875 223875 - Pretty far, I guess.
- Ought to hurry, hon.

223958 226125 - Thanks, Mama. Come on.
- Whoa, they got me, baby!

227541 229392 - Oh, my plate. My plate.
- Babe, forget the fucking plate.

229416 231476 - Yeah, that looks good. Okay.
- You don't need the fucking turkey.

233625 235833 We're going
a lot farther than Tijuana.
239791 241500 Jady, Moke, come here a minute.
243916 246750 Now, you need to take care of him,
246833 250416 and you need to take care of him.
250500 251916 That is the whole deal now.
262666 264250 You could take us with you.

270375 272625 Oh, no, I left
my turkey on the car!

280583 284041 And me and Moke,

284125 286500 Come on, eat my ass, fuckers!
286583 288208 Please go easy, baby. I'm infirm.
288291 291458 Hey, we got 'em. We got 'em. It's okay.

291541 294125 It's okay.
You're not bleeding even anymore.

294208 296958 Don't worry, honeybee.
I'll stash the goods.

299541 301184 - They're so fucking beautiful.
- Babe, what are you doing?

380375 382458 Now, I could've kept
pulling jobs forever,

382541 386208 but when you work with family,
it sometimes gets complicated.
388041 390416 Relax, Moke. This is the last one.

390500 393208 Last one?
You've been saying that since we were 12.
399750 401750 If you don't want to do it, don't do it.
403041 404791 Yeah, what are you gonna do if I don't?
404875 406000 I don't know, case solo jobs

406083 407809 or get somebody else
who's not such a wet blanket all the time.

409166 411416 I'm not worrying about you.
I'm just wondering.

411500 413416 God, Mom would be
so bummed with you right now.
414958 416708 Hey! Did it ever occur to you

416791 418142 that maybe she was doing
the best she could?

418166 421083 Did it ever occur to you how different
things could've been for us?

422583 425184 And I can't believe you, with this
negative shit right now right before work.

437666 439500 You got this.
Tension's right there, bro.

450291 453083 "Go start the van."
What am I, valet?
483416 486125 Let me see them hands! Drop the bag!

489375 490892 Okay, I'll admit it.
We probably should've

490916 493250 stayed home that night,
had some soup, went to bed early.
495375 497625 I don't know. Whatever normal people do.

501458 504208 Get on the ground!
Onto your knees!

507500 511000 You only got two options
when you screw up your life.
514708 517458 Or, like I said, you can unfuck it.
517541 519833 And that's what I was going to do.
522458 525041 Aw, that's nice of you, Muzzy.
525125 526708 You did always have the softest lips.

528833 531166 Still want to know
how you sprung for an early bounce.
534666 537291 You here to walk me out, Farful?
542291 544250 could I get your dad's address?
544333 546458 I really want to send him a fruit basket.
549541 551916 Courts review cases all the time.

554833 557833 I really appreciate you putting

567416 569059 Would you go and make sure
that Mr. Munger's paperwork
572166 574541 Seems like a nice guy. Eh.
580583 582000 You giving me a little poke-poke?
583166 585875 No, I am not giving you a poke-poke.

585958 589250 Do not fuck with me

590333 592875 You'll be back in here

600666 604333 And remember,
you have some emeralds to deliver.

615166 617333 Don't get me wrong,
running three restaurants is great,

617416 621291 but I think I'm more, like,
regional manager material.
621375 622767 I mean, I could be making, like, 125,000...

622791 625916 - Hey, babe, you'll get the party platter?

631666 632892 - Yep.

632916 635750 My dad hates the crushed ice

635833 637416 Copy that. Uh, cubes, not crushed.

640208 643791 That he makes me nervous,
like our house is a report card.

643875 647083 Abs, it's gonna be fine.
We're gonna do this together.
649958 652000 Yeah, Daryl got a raise after nine months.

652083 654833 I've been there a year.
I'm good. I'm good.

663000 665291 We just bought a house.
We're having a kid.

665375 668916 I mean, in-insurance?
I don't understand. Who called?
669000 670500 Uh, it's the Bureau of, uh...
670583 672833 it was the Labor and Employment Bureau

672916 675625 doing a survey

675708 679625 You... you didn't disclose your records

682958 686041 I was gonna get a party platter.

695833 697791 I wanted to talk to you about...

706416 708750 And I'm telling you,
I thought it was "Peace Corpse,"

708833 711291 - and I was gonna be saving dead people.

711375 714291 Oh, my God, you ordered a clown.

740166 742916 - She seems great.
- She is great.

749500 752291 I ta... I talked with Freddie Unk
at the legal clinic, and...

753791 756375 ...he suggested
I just stay away from the trial.
765750 768750 I mean, you ghosted me, man.

777958 781583 There's a crooked screw in there
named Farful. His dad's a judge.
781666 785083 Let's just say I cut a low-key deal to
789166 790875 Bought a score from a lifer,

790958 793500 pitched Farful 50%
if he could tap his dad for me.
800375 803208 You could rip that open like wet bread.

810333 815000 I'm having a housewarming-
slash-baby-shower-type deal today,
815083 817083 and you can have barbecue or ice cream,

817166 819625 whatever it is you want,
and then just go on your way,

819708 822625 and don't ever mention this
crazy shit to me again.
825833 827208 But our end would be low seven.
829500 831083 But I don't want to do it without you.
831166 832666 I guess you can't do it, then.

853708 858375 So, Mike's ears were, like,
so messed up as a kid,

858458 861333 he was basically deaf
until he was about ten years old,

861416 864291 that he couldn't pronounce "J.T.,"
so he said "Jady."

867458 869898 so I said "Moke," but that's,
you know, just because I'm lazy.
871083 873041 How have I never heard about this?

875583 877767 Oh, come on, Moke, I didn't tell 'em
about the goblin mask
877791 880500 and the coins and the police.

908750 910291 - You want to get high?
- Yep.

913375 915791 Oh, that's pretty great qual...
that's... Yes.

923625 925958 You're not just providing
for yourself anymore, Michael.

926041 929666 A-A college education can run
a million plus these days.

933958 936583 - No, dude.
- No, helicopters are not cool.

936666 940125 - Avery Stuart Jacobson!
- Oh, let me be alive!

942666 944458 I'm gonna kick your ass,
you stupid stoner!

950458 952166 - Seriously, you guys?
- So much anger!

954500 956958 Trying to look impressive,
and you're embarrassing me!
958333 960791 It's like wrestling a jelly doughnut!

966416 968833 That was the opposite
of what I need right now.
971000 974000 It's why-why I didn't want him to stay.

974083 975976 Oh, you're going with this is my fault?
That's your strategy?
978750 981083 Jady wasn't in the Peace Corps.

983166 986041 No tan, soft hands,
stick and poke on his neck?
986125 989250 What was he locked up for?

994250 997208 - Look, he and I, years ago...
- Hey. I know.

997291 999458 You went over the speed limit a bit.
So did I.

999541 1003625 Neither of us were perfect,
but we can be better now.

1011666 1015666 She does half the shit I did,
she's going to, like, military school.

1021791 1024375 Just don't bring this fucked-up energy
to the holiday.

1073166 1075708 So, what's up?
You don't like your new phone?
1075791 1078000 I-I li... I like it. Huh?
1078083 1079392 So, how come it's not on ya, huh?
1081083 1083583 Come on, Farful. I just got some grub.
1085916 1088500 From now on, this stays with you.

1088583 1093333 And when I say, "Call me,"
I want you to think of that like...

1093416 1097333 like a little doggie would
when he hears me say, "Heel."

1097416 1101041 And I don't mean at some point.
I don't mean in the future.

1101125 1105291 What I do mean is, exactly at that moment
in time, you fucking call me!

1114625 1117666 But it takes time.
I got to line up the talent.

1117750 1121333 - Talent?
- Yeah, I can't do it all by myself.

1121416 1123375 Specialists, you know,
come out of my pocket.
